entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Recognize Shift(vec, vec(8)) and replace with Shift(vec, 8) #99009
    Future
  • [.NET 8] [android] case where Mono debugger doesn't "break" correctly on unhandled exceptions #99007
  • Interop.0.1 failing on gcstress pipeline #99001
  • Internal CLR error in System.Reflection.FieldAccessor.GetValue #98998
    8.0.x
  • Unknown reloc type 264 and some decode failures on linux-arm64 nativeaot collection #98996
  • Possible memory leak with Native Host API #98995
  • [API Proposal]: Add a Stream type that writes to a TextWriter #98987
  • PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials crashes on Windows Sandbox #98982
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 4 Regressions on 2/25/2024 4:37:10 PM #99002
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 2/23/2024 10:12:07 PM #99004
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 2/20/2024 7:35:45 PM #99003
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 3 Regressions on 2/19/2024 10:53:50 AM #99006
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24123.6] Windows SDK thrown "Non-blittable generic types cannot be marshaled" exception. #98977
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: reflection/DefaultInterfaceMethods/Emit/Emit.cmd #98973
  • Test failure: CoreMangLib/system/delegate/regressions/devdivbugs/113347/DDB113347/DDB113347.cmd #98972
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_63942/Runtime_63942/Runtime_63942.cmd #98971
  • [PERF] Mono AOT BDN runs failing to build "Unable to compile method" #98967
  • [outerloop] System.Runtime.Numerics BigInteger assert failure #98966
  • [outerloop] System.Runtime.Tests crash with exit code 137 in linux debug coreclr #98964
  • [outerloop] RegexKnownPatternTests.RecreationalRegex_Rectangle either fails with `Specified argument was out of the range of valid values.` or times out #98962
  • Queue<T>.Dequeue throws NullReferenceException in .NET 8 Release build #98961
  • [PERF] Performance Wasm AOT jobs are failing due to Dia2Lib issue #98960

Closed

  • BitArray.CopyTo throws IndexOutOfRangeException under certain conditions #98859
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/eh/nested/general/throwinfinallynestedintry_ro/throwinfinallynestedintry_ro.dll #98915
    9.0.0
  • How to unit test `Activity`, or how to bypass the concurrency issue with `ActivityListener`? #98854
    Future
  • Is it correct way to check that interface is from .NET? #98072
  • RuntimeHelpers.Equals incorrectly compares an extra four bytes on x64 #98875
  • Possible DependencyInjection service scope validation regression, blocking dependency flow into dotnet/aspnetcore #98551
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: IntrinsicsInSystemPrivateCoreLib.Test.IntrinsicsInSystemPrivateCoreLibUnitTest.TestHelperMethodsUnrelatedPropertyDoesntHelp #98970
  • Exception on `MakeGenericMethod` called on a static interface method from `GetInterfaceMap`'s `TargetMethods` for a default interface implementation #90863
    9.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS Mono HelloWorld startup regression #96449
    9.0.0
  • Regular high HTTP response times with HTTPClientFactory #97562
  • Reusing the same SocketAsyncEventArgs for different udp remote endpoints does not work anymore #97965
    9.0.0
  • Xamarin iOS application crashes after hover mouse over System.DateTime #98949
  • System.Linq.Enumerable.TryGetNonEnumeratedCount<TSource> doesn't use IReadOnlyCollection<T>.Count #98976
  • XUnitLogChecker: Frames are sometimes unresolved #94721
    9.0.0
  • XUnitLogChecker: `runtime-libraries-coreclr outerloop` tests are unable to find the tool DLL #96035
    9.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly System.Buffers after deploy using windows installer #97366

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: start checking sum of successor likelihoods #99024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Increase tolerances for floating point types in TP tests. #99023
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Ensure `Array.Resize` creates an array of the same type as the incoming array #99021
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Disable QUIC tests on alpine arm32 #99020
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix an assert with `Unsafe.Subtract` #99019
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AB_3B to EI_3A #99017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Increase timeout in profiler multiple test #99014
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Mark Vector.IsSupported as intrinsic #99013
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Convert small atomic fallbacks to managed #99011
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add back OverridePackageId for the crossgen sfxproj #99005
    area-Setup
  • Revert "[wasm] Disable the System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript tests on mt whi…" #99000
    area-Build-mono
  • Disable IPV6 cases of QuicConnectionTests.TestConnect on non-ipv6 systems #98999
    area-System.Net
  • [mono][aot] Avoid a crash if a method's signature cannot be loaded. #98997
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Disable source gen unit tests on mono. #98994
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use successor edges instead of block targets for remaining block kinds #98993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add missing jumpTable increment #98992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [release/6.0-staging] Set assets manifest metadata for assets that get shipped with .NET release #98991
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/7.0-staging] Set assets manifest metadata for assets that get shipped with .NET release #98989
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add ProducesNetCoreAssets property to Publishing.props #98988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser][wbt] Fix not failing `DownloadProgressFinishes` test when randomly picked index is zero #98985
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Debug RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #98981
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Consolidate LINQ's internal IIListProvider/IPartition into base Iterator class #98969
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • Disable failing outerloop regex test #98965
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Fix exception in BitArray.CopyTo when destination array is too small #99018
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add most x86 ReadyToRunHelperNode/ReadyToRunGenericHelperNode helpers #98930
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview2] Revert "Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR (#97079)" #99016
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GG_3A` to `SVE_GH_3A` #98316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/9.0-preview2] Fix the new EH with hot-cold split code #99015
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix the new EH with hot-cold split code #99012
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_BF_2A` to `SVE_FU_2A` #98968
    arch-arm64-sve
  • Set the wasRelocHandled flag #99008
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update diasymreader to 17.8.7-beta1.24113.1 #98539
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.4
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview2] #98551 - Regression in DI scope validation #99010
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 9.0.0
  • #98551 - Regression in DI scope validation #98661
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Interface maps' TargetMethods array should only contain generic method definitions, not instances #98790
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encoding for groups IF_SVE_CW_4A #98762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • x86/funclets: Fix enumerating GC refs in methods with exception handling and localloc #98934
    arch-x86, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move common S.P.CoreLib code under libs #98947
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable the System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript tests on mt whi… #98951
    area-Build-mono
  • fix SendTo with SocketAsyncEventArgs #98134
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Stop overbuilding runtime-prereqs #98980
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: update block weight for uncond to cond flow opt #98324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the assertion error for DynamicHelpers::CreateDictionaryLookupHelper(). #98741
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Special case arrays in Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty #98963
    area-System.Linq
  • Remove GT_STORE_DYN_BLK #98905
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NAOT/x86] Pass hidden argument in EAX register for direct virtual stubs #98927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Don't set RM field when fcvt doesn't round #98857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • XUnitLogChecker: Ensure missing stack frames are resolved on Windows using dotnet-sos #98397
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Ensuring XUnitLogChecker is included in libraries outerloop #97135
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BH_3A,3B,3B_A #98764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Update linux musl arm32 helix image to Alpine 3.17 #98531
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Do not compare Span<T> with null #98958
    area-Meta
  • Fix exception callstack showing incorrect line number #98953
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove ref struct pinning from locals #97997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Build special win-x86 JIT with funclets for NativeAOT #98924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [runtime] Infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add analyzer support for feature checks #94944
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update SDK to preview 1 release #98476
    area-Infrastructure
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • chore(ilc/mach-o): add workaround or fix for problem with dead_strip #96743
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Don't call user callbacks on MsQuic worker thread. #98361
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix conflicting TADDR definition #98925
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Restore erroneously removed encoding of the argument count in a generic method instantiation #98825
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.4
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Check if AttributeData for InterfaceTypeAttribute is not null in ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterfaceAnalyzer #98873
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.4
  • Console.Unix: Fix use of terminfo for get window size cache #98912
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Reapply revert of https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/97227, fix Lock's waiter duration computation #98876
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Add issue template for localization data issues #98899
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • CoreCLR NativeAOT - ByRef generics and ByRef implementing interfaces #98070
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][mt] Guard more places for blocking wait on JS interop threads #98508
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fix TryParseBigIntegerHexOrBinaryNumberStyle #97995
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • WIP: Make FailFast a QCall #98908
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98385
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98384
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98383
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Optimize the overflow check for `GT_ADD` and `GT_SUB` in emitter::emitInsTernary(). #98742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Don't run net4x tests with Mono on non-Windows #98767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Implement Swift's physical lowering pass for NativeAOT #98831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix handling of x86 managed calling convention for hidden parameters #98926
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GivenThatWeHaveAPackageReferenceWithAliases tests failing in CI #39068
  • SDK msbuild tasks aren't shipping their deps.json file #39034
  • dotnet build and workload stops working after updating, Roslyn: Unhandled Exception: System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException: The given key was not present in the dictionary #39033

Closed

  • Provide alpine arm64 image #39071
  • Windows Update repeatedly reinstalls .NET version 5.0.17 #33887
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Cherry-pick #38956 to release/8.0.3xx #39070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WIP] Change how Publish depends on Build #39069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.2xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39045
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39044
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39041
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39040
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39039
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39036
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid race condition in ArgumentsReflector.csproj #39060
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix typo in VsMsdeploy.cs #38915
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use `Convert.ToHexStringLower` #38965
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dotnet/format to preview2 #39049
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [WIP] Check PublishSelfContained #37693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure watch supports environment variable directives #39022
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, DO NOT MERGE, 8.0.4
  • Remove getX MSBuild flags from restore invocation #38956
    Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, DO NOT MERGE, 8.0.4
  • Add dotnet-format to the SDK repo #37717
    Area-Format
  • Include CodeStyle targets files even when not enforcing code style in build #38968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Select the first TFM when `run`ning a multi-targeted application #38995
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822
  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0
  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ```WellKnownMember.System_String__Format_IFormatProvider``` should actually be a `SpecialMember` #72280

Closed

  • Add `WorkspaceKind.Primary` and use it for VisualStudioWorkspace #72064
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34626.67 #72282
  • CSharpImplementExplicitlyCodeRefactoringProvider threw and exception and crashed #70534
    17.10 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix 'convert to file scoped namespace' and interpolated raw strings #72297
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Feedback on deferring compilation creations. #72295
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update code to be more consistent. #72294
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72292
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • WIP: Defer array creation in ConcurrentCache. #72291
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Pass full paths to make-bootstrap #72275
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exporting services for specific workspace kinds #72236
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Defer creating compilation caches till needed #72290
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations under SolutionCompilationState by using ImmutableSegmentedDictionary #72220
  • Fix crash in 'switch implementation to be explicit' #72288
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow frozen snapshots to store stale information about filepaths #72281
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Snap 17.10P2 #72283
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update data for 17.10P2 snap #72284
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Introduce Parameter Crash #72191
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix asserts when emitting calls with optional byref parameters #72203
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Reduce allocations in lexer #72243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations under RemoteAssetProvider.SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72229
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fixed List pattern is not correctly formatted in the first arm of a switch expression #72269
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • GetRelative paths accepts paths shorter than the base directory #72166
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove redundant null check when using recursive patterns refactor #72185
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Include SourceLink file in CoreCompile dependency checks #72109
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • Improve behavior of SyntaxRemoveOptions.AddElasticMarker #72255
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Avoid performing a defensive copy for enum parameters #72246
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Do not return unexisting kinds in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8 Blazor - Enhanced Navigation DOM Patching Algorithm and Link Elements #54250
  • In the Blazor 8.0 project, using the RenderMode.InteractiveServer mode on both the HeadOutlet and Routes components caused occasional Javascript crashes. #54249
  • Identity functions not working #54248
  • Perf regression: mapaction #54246
  • WebApplicationFactory does not support common output path. #54243
  • A bug?? -> .NET 8 - the page 'error' in the new Blazor Web App (WebAssembly) redirects to 404 #54238
  • Allow access to the RequestDelegate instance from middleware #54237
    Discussions

Closed

  • Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect version 7+ does not read at least couple of properties (Issuers, IssuerSigningKeys JwksUri) #52330
  • Align HTTP tracing with OTEL semantic conventions #53430
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Signing keys not retrieved from authority when using AddJwtBearer #52296
  • [Announcement] ASP.NET Core in .NET 8 is now available! #52046
  • Cannot attach tokens to outgoing HttpClient requests #53798
  • NavigationManager.Navigate throws in OnInitialized if component is static #54203
  • SignalR's JSON protocol does not support polymorphic serialization on streaming methods #54227
  • [Blazor] Blazor WebAssembly perf benchmarks are failing #54230
    9.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • Use constant values for CorsPolicy.cs and CorsPolicyBuilder.cs #54247
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • [release/6.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54242
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54241
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/8.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54240
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Caching: SE.Redis update and fix naming inconsistency #54239
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix WASM perf benchmarks #54231
    area-blazor, area-perf

Updated

  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure
  • Avoid call to ASCII.GetBytes during HostFilteringMiddleware static initialization #52978
    community-contribution, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Test against net9.0 #4529
  • Add some diag info options to host commands #4528

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ProgressColor does not work on Mac Catalyst with the macOS UI Idiom #20876
  • Permission bug: Bluetooth scanning without location permission on Android 12+ #20871
  • Controls in ListView.Header and Footer don't raise Loaded/Unloaded #20869
  • .Net MAUI iOS app install but does not update #20868
  • Font Icons in Shell Tabs not showing in iOS #20866
  • The keyboard switches from numeric to alphabetic when assigning text from the TextChangedEvent to the Entry control. #20864
  • ImageEditor control is not visible inside Frame on iOS #20862
  • FlyoutPage Android app crashing on orientation change #20858
    Backlog
  • Viewcell tap gesture not working with datatemplate selector in MAUI 8.0 #20857
  • [Bug][Maccatalyst][IOS], ShouldChangeCharacters override method is not called while typing the accent keys. #20856
  • Grouped CollectionView items not rendered properly on Android, works on Windows #20855

Closed

  • DataBinding corrupted: not updating values, when it does, it’s alternating with 0 value #20821

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ToQueryString() and ToDbCommand() variants that accept the entire query as an argument #33181
  • Custom ValueConverter generates correct SQL in expression eval but incorrect TSQL #33180
  • wrong records in result set #33179
  • Support .NET 9.0 Index to ROW_NUMBER #33178
  • Support .NET 9.0 CountBy #33177
  • [8.0.2] OutOfMemoryException when creating migration using ef tool #33176
  • Unable to retrieve entities from InMemoryDatabase when entity type has a generic complex type property #33172
  • Ability to define custom joins #33171
  • unable to use a ComplexType in an Owned type #33170

Closed

  • Allow creation of an update/delete DbCommand from an EF IQueryable #33167
  • Batch execution of multiple ExecuteUpdate / ExecuteDelete / ExecuteSql #33143
  • Q: Where is DynamicModelCacheKeyFactoryDesignTimeSupport registered in the sample project? #33091
  • Entity Framework results in timeout errors, particularly when using OrderBy in conjunction with Take #33158

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #33175
  • [release/7.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #33174
  • [release/8.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #33173

Merged

  • Test migration path generation #32760
  • Bump PreReleaseVersionIteration #33168
  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 3.0.0-preview-0045-g9b6fc72764 to 3.0.0-preview-0049-g4f33c8d8b1 #33163
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fixed typo in getting-and-building-the-code.md #33166
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Discover the compiled model automatically #33148
